tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional care Dr. Nivedita Kaul provided throughout my pregnancy, delivery, and postpartum period. Your unwavering support and understanding made a significant difference during this incredibly important time in my life.

From our initial consultations to the day of delivery, and continuing through the postpartum phase, you have been nothing short of outstanding. Your prompt responses to my queries, even via WhatsApp, were a testament to your dedication and commitment to your patients. It was incredibly reassuring to know that you were always just a call or message away.

Your compassionate and attentive approach made me feel valued and cared for every step of the way. I genuinely appreciate your expertise and the personal touch you brought to my care. It is clear that you are not only a skilled professional but also someone who deeply cares about the well-being of your patients.
Thank you for everything you’ve done. I am so grateful to have had you by my side during this journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My mother recently visited Dr. Nivedita Kaul at CK Birla Hospital, Punjabi Bagh, Delhi, for an ovarian cyst problem. Given our family's history of cancer, we were extremely worried. However, from our very first visit, Dr. Nivedita put us at ease. *** *********** *** *** ********* ***** *** ********* *** ***** ** ***** ********
After the tests, we discovered that the tumor in my mother's ovary was small but potentially malignant. Dr. Nivedita advised laparoscopic surgery to remove the left ovary. She explained everything about the surgery, both pre and post-procedure, with great clarity and positivity. The surgery was successful, and we only had to spend one night in the hospital. Dr. Nivedita patiently answered all our questions, whether during visits or even over calls and WhatsApp.

Dr. Nivedita is incredibly thorough and has a wonderfully positive approach. We really appreciate Dr. Nivedita's passion and commitment towards her patients. She is truly a doctor every patient deserves. 

Thank you, Dr. Nivedita, for your help. We highly recommend Dr. Nivedita Kaul.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Child Birth Education,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Gynecological Services,
review: I feel we are blessed that we found Nivedita Kaul Ma’am. People get amazed when i tell them that i changed my gynaecologist in the 7th Month. I found Nivedita Ma’am in my 7th Month of pregnancy and in the first meeting itself i knew she is the one who can guide me and the only person who should bring my baby in this world. She is a very good gynaecologist, who has a lot of experience and will always answer all your queries and she will be available for her patients 24*7 no matter what. With Mam’s grace i was blessed with a healthy baby boy this April and she was there with me to motivate me during and after my delivery. To be brief, she is just not only a good doctor but an amazing soul who will help you in every way possible.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy,High Risk Pregnancy management,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,
review:
We consulted Dr. Nivedita on recommendation of an acquaintance. Our experience was really satisfying. She is a very professional person with great explanation skills. From basic diet and exercise in pregnancy to antenatal care she explains everything. She believes in prescribing as less medicine as one could. 
Mine was a high risk pregnancy and how patiently she dealt with that for me to reach in my 38th week is worth recommending. She managed my stress and motivated me throughout. 
Completely worth it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Nivedita Kaul is truly one gem of a person. She has helped me in successfully delivering my twin babies at CK Birla Hospital. Our pregnancy had some challenges in the beginning but with Nivedita Mam's knowledge and confidence it all came out as a success in the end. We were really impressed by how she was able to predict the different stages throughout my pregnancy journey and hence we had absolute faith in her. And not only pregnancy she patiently helped me with my queries during the postpartum phase as well be it on WhatsApp or on regular visits. I would definitely recommend Nivedita Mam ** *** ** *** **** ************* ********* ** ** ********** ** **** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Nivideta is really friendly and understanding. During my labour pains she made sure that I was taken care of and was also available on calls during odd hours as well. 
She is really knowledgeable and doesn’t encourage unnecessary tests and medicines.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Nivedita operated the patient in an emergency as the internal bleeding had already started. 
She had ensured that all necessary arrangements were made before we reach the hospital and there is no time wasted. 
Post the operation she explained the whole process and answered any questions that we might've had.
Due to her proactive approach, the patient didn't have much blood loss and the recovery was also smooth without any complications.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dear Dr. Nivedita Kaul Ma'am

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to take a moment to express my sincere gratitude for the exceptional care you provided during my recent surgery of left ovary removal. I am 41 years old and was very shocked when I came to know about this as this was my first surgery. 

From our initial consultation to the surgery itself, your professionalism and attentiveness reassured me every step of the way. I truly appreciate the time you took to answer all my questions very politely and address my concerns.

Thanks to your skillful hands and dedication, I am on the road to recovery, and back to my routine.I feel fortunate to have had you as my doctor.

Thank you once again for everything. 

Warm regards,

Bhawana Rastogi

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: She gets angry by calling more than one person and does not reply to WhatsApp messages I didn't like it and I don't advise anyone to approach her
reply_text:
Dear Sir
When a doctor shares their number with you it means that it is for an emergency. You called me at least 8 times in 2 days and I picked up the call every single time. I even responded on WhatsApp twice and for the rest of your WhatsApp’s my coordinator Jasmeet responded. 
I’m sorry but no doctor can fulfill your unreasonable expectations. 
I wish I had the option to publish the call records and WhatsApp chats to prove my point.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Caution: Long post ahead, might take few minutes of your time ;)

They say, God cannot be everywhere, so He sent the doctors with excellence and selflessness. 

The aforesaid unequivocally holds true in case of Dr.Nivedita Kaul.

I have known Dr. Kaul for almost 9 years now, at the time when she was at the beginning of her career and was assisting one senior doctor. At that time, I used to visit the senior doctor for my routine check-ups and Dr. Kaul would be the one who would initially take patient briefings. Even then, I was so fascinated with her pleasing personality and the way she would interact with her patients. 

Little did I know that one day, she’d be the one who would bring our little bundle of joy into this world, hence, filling our lives with happiness in abundance. 

If you are trying to conceive or are expecting, you want a doctor who you can trust and with whom conversations come naturally. With whom you can be yourself and talk your heart out. You’re looking for a confidante you can feel comfortable with, who’ll be there through important and personal aspects of your life. You should be able to talk openly and honestly about your worries and plans, and leave feeling understood, confident about your next steps together. You want someone who can paint the entire big picture before you and tell you what exactly you are going through. Someone who is just a call away. 

Keeping all this in mind, Dr. Nivedita’s name is the first name that would come to my mind. So, I always wanted to consult her for my pregnancy but due to long distance, we were a bit skeptical. 

So, we initially started consulting a gynae in our vicinity. But I was never fully satisfied. I would always tell my husband that I don’t feel connected to our gynae and I don’t feel happy after each of our visit. But since there were no complications as such, we continued. 

However, during fifth month of my pregnancy (in Feb 2021), I started facing low liquor issues which also started affecting growth of our baby. So, we decided to take second consultation from Dr. Nivedita. We visited her clinic and she explained to us in great detail all our tests and reports.  She told us that there was nothing to worry about and further asked us to keep her in loop going forward. 

Thereafter, due to emergence of second wave of covid, I had to resort to tele and video consultation. I kept Dr. Nivedita abreast with all my tests and reports that were being advised by my other doctor. She would allay all our doubts and fears that would come up each time I had a scan. 

Then, towards the end of May, when I had my Growth and Doppler scan, we were appalled to see that the growth lag had risen to 2.5 weeks which was suggestive of mild asymmetric IUGR and the liquor had further reduced drastically (AFI ~ 8). Moreso, my own body weight  had started reducing. Liquor did not increase despite treatment prescribed by my other gynae. Infact, she had indicated that we might have to deliver the baby in first week of June (Due date: 8.7.21) through caesarean. 

We instantly decided to switch to Dr. Nivedita. 
Dr. Kaul calmed us down and explained to us all the options that were available to us. She prescribed daily IV drips and NST monitoring for a week and then for another week on alternate days. She also asked to increase the protein intake (she said jitna thoos sakte ho, thoos lo, jaan laga do poori :)).

In the next scan, we were happily surprised to see that my liquor had increased and the baby’s weight had also increased to an ok level. 

With her **** ******* ********* *** sensibility and taking full responsibility of the risk involved, she pulled through 20 days, which were sufficient to take me upto 36 weeks and 5 days (to avoid keeping the baby in nursery). 

She called me for physical examination and told us that she had stretched for long enough and that now she would like to bring out the baby. She also told that we could try for normal birth first. 

And yes, finally, we did have a normal birthing experience. I delivered a beautiful baby girl on 21st June, 2021.  I had two wishes - first, to have a healthy baby through normal birth and second to have my husband by my side during the delivery process. I don’t think this would have been possible if it weren’t for Dr. Nivedita. 

The best thing about Dr. Nivedita is that she has such a positive aura and positive approach that even when you are facing certain complications in your pregnancy, you will feel that everything will sort out on it’s own. She has the capability to change the negative situations into positive one ! Also, she has some kind of photographic memory. I don’t know how she manages it, but she mostly remembers details of all her patients. She always answers your calls and replies to your messages. She prescribed only limited and relevant scans, tests and medicines. She is very polite, down to earth and friendly. 

Dr. Nivedita, my husband and I would like to
thank you for everything that you’ve done, for all your support during some really tough times. I mean, “Thank you” doesn’t even begin to cover how we feel. We are thankful beyond words can express. Tears of joy roll down my eyes everytime I think of my entire journey with you. You are an amazing doctor and above all, a beautiful person inside out. *** *** ****** **** ****** 

Whenever we felt anxious or afraid of all the unknowns, all we had to do was talk to you and we knew in our heart that it would all work out. Your ever present compassion, attention to detail, always being available, support and care, amongst several other things provided me and my husband such comfort during the entire pregnancy. You are extremely gifted and talented. You are truly God sent ! 

We may have paid for your fees, but for your kindness we shall forever remain indebted. 

I would like to tell everyone that before you choose your gynae, trust your instinct. My instinct guided me towards Dr. Nivedita. 

I would recommend her strongly for all your gynaecological concerns.

review: Great explanation of everything, addressed all the queries to my utmost satisfaction. Polite and friendly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My Birth Story fairly swift and everything I could have asked for and being Dr. Nivedita Kaul by my side made it easier, less pressured and memorable..

I started feeling contractions on 25th April early morning at 5am, they were bearable and duration was almost 45mins to 30 mins before another contraction. Thought its again a false alarm as I had the similar contraction day before and went for a check at CK birla hospital in night , everything was normal and uterus was relaxed as per the Dr. On duty, so thought I cant make a progress over night for delivering a child,  these contractions will pass in an hour or two as yesterday, although waited patiently. As contraction started shortening and its was a odd time to contact Dr. Still I tried her number and could belive she was able to take calls at this hour , she told me not to panic, reach hospital and she will be there. 
By the time I reached hospital contractions were every 8 to 10mins. They rushed me to labour room and before I could understand anything I was asked to push and special thanks to Dr. Nevidita not only she reached at the hospital as and when called she was a great support thought out my pregnancy and she helped me deliver the child in just 3 push and made this day memorable for lifetime.***** ** *** ** *** **** ** *** **** *** she is clam and composed in high pressure situations , so glad that I came across her and she made it so perfect..
Thank you Dr Nivedita Kaul.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
I visited Dr. Nivedita on recommendation of a friend who  had very good experience with her during her pregnancy.  Though her clinic is not in the near vicinity of my residence but I still preferred her because of strong recommendation. Our trust in Dr. Nivedita enhanced further after meeting her and knowing her expertise* ***** *** **** ********* ** *** ******** Consultation experience with her has been much more than satisfactory. She explains treatment options in much detail so that patients can make informed decision. 

My first pregnancy seven years earlier was a very difficult one. This time around I was very sceptical as I had other health issues as well but Dr. Nivedita, through her continuous monitoring took extra care that all goes well. 
I delivered healthy baby nicely and my pregnancy remained uneventful. I give entire credit to my doctor for that. She always answered my calls amd replied to my messages. I really appreciate that she remembered my details whenever I phoned her, shows her dedication towards her profession. 
I am thankful to Almighty for connecting me with her. I recommend her strongly for gynaecological problems.

review:
Dr. Nivedita Kaul was my Gynaecologist. I started my journey with lots of ifs and buts. Throughout my pregnancy journey she always motivated me, clarified all my queries with detailed explanation and devoted time. She was always available on calls and yes she always reply even when she was busy. I must say she is one of best Gynaecologist I met in my life. She is such a nice, humble and easy to reach Doctor. Highly recommended for people looking for Gynaecologist in Delhi. Thank you so much Doctor for all your guidance and support to made my joyful journey more joyful. 

Moreover i would like to extend my thankful note to ck birla hospital and the staff members who were directly and indirectly supported me throughout.  Rupinder kaur (fro arranging my appointment, also helped during ultrasound) and Ruksana nurse who kept motivating me during my journey.

context: Gynae Problems,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I cannot say enough wonderful things about Dr.Nivedita Kaul , she has handled my two pregnancy, first in 2019  and second in 2022.My first pregnancy was full of challenges with minimum hope of survival of fetus due to various complications but because of Dr. Nivedita I could deliver a healthy baby girl.I must say she is a brilliant Gynae and surgeon. But, what really makes her stand out is how she made me feel like I was his only patient and that she would spend as much time with me as I needed. She was incredibly thorough in not only asking me about my history, but in explaining all my options. She emphasized that I should feel free to contact her any time with any questions. I think the highest compliment one can give to a doctor is that they treat a patient like a member of their family and Dr Nivedita did that for me. I feel so lucky to have found her. Thank you Ma’am

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We are so grateful to have found Dr. Nivedita Kaul . With amazing patience, she handled my case and deeply gone through my all reports, listened to all our queries patiently and responded like family member & after that I felt like “Yes I am now in safe hands”. She doesn't give unnecessary medicines and she is always available for her patients even in odd hours. She provides the emotional support apart from being an outstanding doctor.

Dr. Nivedita is no less than God for us. Because of her only I was able to continue with my complicated pregnancy till 37 weeks. With her blessings, support & right treatment we are blessed with twin baby boy and a girl. we can not put into words our gratitude for the support she has been throughout the journey.

 Nivedita Ma’am you have a place in our hearts.

Happy parents of Mahib & Mehar - Shilpi & Pankaj

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

She acts as your coach, guide and a mentor. She was just a call away when i was pregnant in 2021. She explained me everything & comforted me each time i needed her guidance. Its been a great association with her over the last five years. Thank you Dr. Kaul for all your support

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. NIVEDITA is an amazing doctor who helped me with a condition that I had been suffering with for almost 15 years and no gynaecologist was able to track. (ACUM). During all our consultations, she patiently listened to all my problems and answered all my queries .  I ended up having a laparoscopic surgery for removal of the ACUM. She and her husband, Dr. JAVED have been saviours for me. I feel grateful to have found them. DR.NIVEDITA is such a humble and polite person. And i think that is what we all need during these times, somebody who listens to you patiently and provides you a solution. After my surgery, I have had no problems (severe dysmennorhea) that I was facing during my teenage years and after marriage too. I have recommended her to all my female relatives who face gynaecological issues and she will be my go-to person for all such issues in the near future, if any. Thankyou doctor for all your help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Nivedita is a wonderful doctor and so far she is the best gynaecologist I've met. She is very polite and friendly. She takes the time to listen to the patient and makes sure she explains the diagnosis, the treatment options and plan to the patient. She is very patient and compassionate. Her top priority is the patient's comfort. The best part is that Dr. Kaul prescribes very limited medicine and test and she is more than happy to answer all my questions and doubts. She is honest but never rude or harsh on the patient. I have always had a great experience visiting her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:

I went with my husband for mu ANC check up for the first time & was highly gratified to have met dr nivedita mam given the way she counselled and clinically attended me and my husband. As it was my first pregnancy I was very apprehensive reg. Many things but the doctor counselled and explained everything very immaculately for over 25 min.  
Her serene personality with unerring approach and the habit of indulgence with the patient like a mother is something which separates her from other doctros..I was so comfortable after her first consultation that I said to my husband: " I can go for the delivery inside the delivery room without my mother besides me since the doctor is motherly in her approach. 
THANKS DR NIVEDITA KAUL MAM FOR YOUR CARE & TREATMENT.

context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Exercise,Doppler Scan In Pregnancy,Pregnancy Tests,Post Pregnancy Classes,
review:
When I first visited Dr. Nivedita, I was so happy with her that I had decided that I would consult only her for my pregnancy. 
Two years later, when we got pregnant, I realised that I had made a great choice. 
She is an expert in her field. She explained each and every aspect of the pregnancy in simple terms and helped me through the entire phase. She has a very kind nature. 
She made sure that my entire pregnancy was an extremely pleasant experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: To begin with Dr Nivedita is a very good listener and gave me a good hearing hence I was able to explain my issue well.Then she was able to explain the problem I had and suggested effective remedy/medication. I was suggested a surgery for my issue by another doc but post Dr Nivedita advice my issue was cured with medication. GREAT DOCTOR!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We had visited for my first delivery case on a family member recommendation.
The pressure,anxiety is high in the first pregnancy but under your supervision it was easy and calm.
The first trimester came in the second wave of covid19 but with care and concern it was taken care of very well.
Thanks for making me a mother and helping me recover fast .
Your sincerity and dedication shall always be remembered.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: This was my first pregnancy and i had great experience in terms of treatment, the way Dr. Nivedita explains the process etc it was superb. She just treated me like her own family. I am happy that i had a doctor like her by my side during my first delivery (Normal). Thank you Dr. Nivedita

review: I met Dr. Nivedita kaul when I was advised to remove my ovary due to some reasons. I was  very  worried and under stress but this doctor made me relaxed. She answered each and every query snd answered all the questions calmly. There was no problem during and after the surgery and within a few  days there was a very smooth discharge from the hospital. She is not only a kind person but also a great doctor who respects her patients and treats them with care.
